channel.title: Help with my poweriner

item.title: Help with my poweriner
item.dc:creator: @iloveit8 iloveit8
item.description:
@iloveit8 wrote:

i came this far… but cant seem to fix this error

{=========================================================================]
[                   Anywhere Powerminer                                   ]
[                                                                         ]
[           NAME        : Anywhere Powerminer                             ]
[           WRITER      : Derek9456                                       ]
[           CATEGORY    : Miner                                           ]
[           DESCRIPTION : mines ores and then drops them                  ]
[           USAGE       : Use for leveling up your mining                 ]
[           AUTOCOLOR   : hmmm                                            ]
[           NOTES       : best used in al karid                           ]
[           CONTACT     : troy.cos@gmail.com                              ]
[                                                                         ]
[                                                                         ]
[=========================================================================]
[=========================================================================]
[                           Instructions.                                 ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright.                          ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color.                                ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in DeclarePlayers.                     ]
[=========================================================================}

 {*******************************************************************************
function TimeFromMark(var TimeMarker: integer): integer;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description: returns Milliseconds since MarkTime was set
*******************************************************************************}

program powerminer;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/mining.scar}

const
{//////////SETUP\\\\\\\\\\}
rc1 = 0;
rc2 = 0;
rc3 = 0;
{//////////SETUP\\\\\\\\\\}



var
  frmDesign : TForm;
  Label1 : TLabel;
  Label2 : TLabel;
  Edit1 : TEdit;
  Edit2 : TEdit;
  Button1 : TButton;
  ComboBox1 : TComboBox;
  Username, Password, oretomine : String;
  MineBM,fx,fy : integer;
procedure MM(x,y:integer);
begin
 MMouse(x,y,5,5)
 wait(400+random(600))
 movemousesmooth(x,y)
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
 WriteLn('You have clicked the button');
 frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + '.';
 frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
  mineBM := BitmapFromString(1, 17, 'z78DA3330A0' +
       '070000D9831321');
end;

Procedure setup;
begin
 begin
  Username := Edit1.Text;
  Password := Edit2.Text;
  case ComboBox1.Text of
  'tin'    : oretomine := 'tin';
  'copper' : oretomine := 'copper';
  'iron'   : oretomine := 'iron';
  'coal'   : oretomine := 'coal';
  end;
 wait(1);
 FindPickHeadColor;
 LoadMiningBitMaps;
 LoadBitmaps;
 PickUpItems:=False;
 SaveSetting('UserPassSaver', 'Username', Edit1.Text);
 SaveSetting('UserPassSaver', 'Password', Edit2.Text);
 SaveSetting('UserPassSaver', 'ore', ComboBox1.Text);
end;
end;


procedure initform;
begin
 frmDesign := CreateForm;
 frmDesign.Left := 250;
 frmDesign.Top := 114;
 frmDesign.Width := 272;
 frmDesign.Height := 327;
 frmDesign.Caption := 'Script setup';
 frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
 frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
 frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
 frmDesign.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
 frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
 frmDesign.Visible := False;
 frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
 Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
 Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
 Label1.Left := 36;
 Label1.Top := 45;
 Label1.Width := 48;
 Label1.Height := 13;
 Label1.Caption := 'Username';
 Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
 Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 36;
 Label2.Top := 74;
 Label2.Width := 46;
 Label2.Height := 13;
 Label2.Caption := 'Password';
 Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
 Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
 Edit1.Text := LoadSetting('UserPassSaver', 'Username');
 Edit1.Left := 100;
 Edit1.Top := 43;
 Edit1.Width := 121;
 Edit1.Height := 21;
 Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
 Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
 Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
 Edit1.Text := LoadSetting('UserPassSaver', 'Password');
 Edit2.Left := 100;
 Edit2.Top := 73;
 Edit2.Width := 121;
 Edit2.Height := 21;
 Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
 Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
 Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
 Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
 Button1.Left := 98;
 Button1.Top := 220;
 Button1.Width := 75;
 Button1.Height := 25;
 Button1.Caption := 'start!';
 Button1.TabOrder := 10;
 ComboBox1 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
 ComboBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
 ComboBox1.Left := 56;
 ComboBox1.Top := 115;
 ComboBox1.Width := 145;
 ComboBox1.Height := 21;
 ComboBox1.ItemHeight := 13;
 ComboBox1.TabOrder := 11;
 ComboBox1.Text := 'ore?';
 ComboBox1.Items.Add('tin');
 ComboBox1.Items.Add('copper');
 ComboBox1.Items.Add('iron');
 ComboBox1.Items.Add('coal');
 ComboBox1.Text := LoadSetting('UserPassSaver', 'ore');
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var  v: TVariantArray;
begin
 setarraylength(V, 0);
 ThreadSafeCall('InitForm', v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
 frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure Randoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindPick;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var  v: TVariantArray;
begin
 setarraylength(V, 0);
 ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModal', v);
end;

procedure MineIt;
begin
 if (findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)) or
    (findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)) or
    (findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)) then
 begin
  MM(x,y)
  wait(200+random(1000))
  if (FindBitmapToleranceIn(MineBM,x,y,6,6,126,23,1)) then
   begin
   wait(200 + random(1000);
   if (oretomine = 'tin') then
    begin
    FindObjSpe('tin',rc1,10)
    if (FindObjSpe) then
      begin
      getmousepos(x,y)
      wait(200+random(511))
      MMC(x,y,)
      FindGas(fx,fy)
      repeat
      wait(100)
      until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,x,y,x,y,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,x,y,x,y,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,x,y,x,y,20)or)
      end;
   if (oretomine = 'copper') then
    begin
    FindObjSpe('cop',rc1,10)
    if (FindObjSpe) then
      begin
      getmousepos(x,y)
      wait(200+random(511))
      MMC(x,y,)
      FindGas(fx,fy)
      repeat
      wait(100)
      until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,x,y,x,y,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,x,y,x,y,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,x,y,x,y,20)or)
      end;
   if (oretomine = 'iron') then
    begin
    FindObjSpe('iro',rc1,10)
    if (FindObjSpe) then
      begin
      getmousepos(x,y)
      wait(200+random(511))
      MMC(x,y,)
      FindGas(fx,fy)
      repeat
      wait(100)
      until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,x,y,x,y,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,x,y,x,y,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,x,y,x,y,20)or)
      end;
   if (oretomine = 'coal') then
    begin
    FindObjSpe('coa',rc1,10)
    if (FindObjSpe) then
      begin
      getmousepos(x,y)
      wait(200+random(511))
      MMC(x,y,)
      FindGas(fx,fy)
      repeat
      wait(100)
      until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,x,y,x,y,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,x,y,x,y,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,x,y,x,y,20)or)
      end;
   end;
 end;
end;





procedure MMC(x,y:integer);
begin
 MMouse(x,y,5,5)
 wait(400+random(600))
 movemousesmooth(x,y)
 wait(400+random(600))
 holdmouse(x,y,true)
 wait(200+random(300))
 releasemouse(x,y,true)
end;

begin
setupSRL;
MarkTime;
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
setup;
end.

good luck

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my poweriner
item.dc:creator: @derek9456 derek9456
item.description:
@derek9456 wrote:

[code][code
{=========================================================================]
[ Anywhere Powerminer ]
[ ]
[ NAME : Anywhere Powerminer ]
[ WRITER : Derek9456 ]
[ CATEGORY : Miner ]
[ DESCRIPTION : mines ores and then drops them ]
[ USAGE : Use for leveling up your mining ]
[ AUTOCOLOR : hmmm ]
[ NOTES : best used in al karid ]
[ CONTACT : troy.cos@gmail.com ]
[ ]
[ ]
[=========================================================================]
[=========================================================================]
[ Instructions. ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in DeclarePlayers. ]
[=========================================================================}

{*******************************************************************************
function TimeFromMark(var TimeMarker: integer): integer;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description: returns Milliseconds since MarkTime was set
*******************************************************************************}

program powerminer;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/mining.scar}

const
{//////////SETUP\\\\\}
rc1 = 0;
rc2 = 0;
rc3 = 0;
{//////////SETUP\\\\\}

var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;
ComboBox1 : TComboBox;
Username, Password, oretomine : String;
MineBM,fx,fy : integer;

Procedure setup;
begin
begin
Username := Edit1.Text;
Password := Edit2.Text;
case ComboBox1.Text of
‘tin’ : oretomine := ‘tin’;
‘copper’ : oretomine := ‘copper’;
‘iron’ : oretomine := ‘iron’;
‘coal’ : oretomine := ‘coal’;
end;
wait(1);
FindPickHeadColor;
LoadMiningBitMaps;
LoadBitmaps;
PickUpItems:=False;
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Username’, Edit1.Text);
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Password’, Edit2.Text);
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘ore’, ComboBox1.Text);
end;

Procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

procedure initform;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 272;
frmDesign.Height := 327;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Script setup’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 36;
Label1.Top := 45;
Label1.Width := 48;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘Username’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 36;
Label2.Top := 74;
Label2.Width := 46;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘Password’;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Text := LoadSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Username’);
Edit1.Left := 100;
Edit1.Top := 43;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Text := LoadSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Password’);
Edit2.Left := 100;
Edit2.Top := 73;
Edit2.Width := 121;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Button1.Left := 98;
Button1.Top := 220;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘start!’;
Button1.TabOrder := 10;
ComboBox1 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
ComboBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
ComboBox1.Left := 56;
ComboBox1.Top := 115;
ComboBox1.Width := 145;
ComboBox1.Height := 21;
ComboBox1.ItemHeight := 13;
ComboBox1.TabOrder := 11;
ComboBox1.Text := ‘ore?’;
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘tin’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘copper’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘iron’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘coal’);
ComboBox1.Text := LoadSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘ore’);
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure Randoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindPick;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
WriteLn(‘You have clicked the button’);
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

procedure MineIt;
begin
if (findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)) or
(findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)) or
(findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)) then
begin
MM(x,y)
wait(200+random(1000))
if (FindBitmapToleranceIn(MineBM,x,y,6,6,126,23,1)) then
begin
wait(200+random(1000)
if (oretomine = ‘tin’) then
begin
FindObjSpe(‘tin’,rc1,10)
if (FindObjSpe) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
wait(200+random(511))
MMC(x,y,)
FindGas(fx,fy)
repeat
wait(100)
until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,x,y,x,y,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,x,y,x,y,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,x,y,x,y,20)or)
end;
if (oretomine = ‘copper’) then
begin
FindObjSpe(‘cop’,rc1,10)
if (FindObjSpe) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
wait(200+random(511))
MMC(x,y,)
FindGas(fx,fy)
repeat
wait(100)
until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,x,y,x,y,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,x,y,x,y,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,x,y,x,y,20)or)
end;
if (oretomine = ‘iron’) then
begin
FindObjSpe(‘iro’,rc1,10)
if (FindObjSpe) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
wait(200+random(511))
MMC(x,y,)
FindGas(fx,fy)
repeat
wait(100)
until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,x,y,x,y,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,x,y,x,y,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,x,y,x,y,20)or)
end;
if (oretomine = ‘coal’) then
begin
FindObjSpe(‘coa’,rc1,10)
if (FindObjSpe) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
wait(200+random(511))
MMC(x,y,)
FindGas(fx,fy)
repeat
wait(100)
until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,x,y,x,y,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,x,y,x,y,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,x,y,x,y,20)or)
end;
end;
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
mineBM := BitmapFromString(1, 17, ‘z78DA3330A0’ +
‘070000D9831321’);
end;

procedure MM(x,y:integer);
begin
MMouse(x,y,5,5)
wait(400+random(600))
movemousesmooth(x,y)
end;

procedure MMC(x,y:integer);
begin
MMouse(x,y,5,5)
wait(400+random(600))
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(400+random(600))
holdmouse(x,y,true)
wait(200+random(300))
releasemouse(x,y,true)
end;

begin
setupSRL;
MarkTime;
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
setup;
end.
[/code]

thanks… i have gotten so many errors… but i have fixed a few that i could figure out

item.title: Help with my poweriner
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

For that procedure use this: [scar]Procedure setup;
begin
begin
Username := Edit1.Text;
Password := Edit2.Text;
case ComboBox1.Text of
‘tin’ : oretomine := ‘tin’;
‘copper’ : oretomine := ‘copper’;
‘iron’ : oretomine := ‘iron’;
‘coal’ : oretomine := ‘coal’;
end;
wait(1);
FindPickHeadColor;
LoadMiningBitMaps;
LoadBitmaps;
PickUpItems:=False;
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Username’, Edit1.Text);
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Password’, Edit2.Text);
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘ore’, ComboBox1.Text);
end;
[/scar]

But what bitmaps are you trying to load?
EDIT: Oh I see what you were trying to load. In order for it to load, it has to be before that procedure for it to work

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my poweriner
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[scar]{=========================================================================]
[ Anywhere Powerminer ]
[ ]
[ NAME : Anywhere Powerminer ]
[ WRITER : Derek9456 ]
[ CATEGORY : Miner ]
[ DESCRIPTION : mines ores and then drops them ]
[ USAGE : Use for leveling up your mining ]
[ AUTOCOLOR : hmmm ]
[ NOTES : best used in al karid ]
[ CONTACT : troy.cos@gmail.com ]
[ ]
[ ]
[=========================================================================]
[=========================================================================]
[ Instructions. ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in DeclarePlayers. ]
[=========================================================================}

{*******************************************************************************
function TimeFromMark(var TimeMarker: integer): integer;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description: returns Milliseconds since MarkTime was set
*******************************************************************************}

program powerminer;
procedure LoadBitmaps; Forward;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/mining.scar}

const
{//////////SETUP\\\\\}
rc1 = 0;
rc2 = 0;
rc3 = 0;
{//////////SETUP\\\\\}

var
frmDesign : TForm;
Label1 : TLabel;
Label2 : TLabel;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Button1 : TButton;
ComboBox1 : TComboBox;
Username, Password, oretomine : String;
MineBM,fx,fy : integer;

Procedure setup;
begin
Username := Edit1.Text;
Password := Edit2.Text;
oretomine := ComboBox1.Text;
LoadMiningBitMaps;
LoadBitmaps;
PickUpItems:=False;
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Username’, Edit1.Text);
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Password’, Edit2.Text);
SaveSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘ore’, ComboBox1.Text);
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

procedure initform;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 272;
frmDesign.Height := 327;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Script setup’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 36;
Label1.Top := 45;
Label1.Width := 48;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘Username’;
Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 36;
Label2.Top := 74;
Label2.Width := 46;
Label2.Height := 13;
Label2.Caption := ‘Password’;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Text := LoadSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Username’);
Edit1.Left := 100;
Edit1.Top := 43;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Text := LoadSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘Password’);
Edit2.Left := 100;
Edit2.Top := 73;
Edit2.Width := 121;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
Button1.Left := 98;
Button1.Top := 220;
Button1.Width := 75;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘start!’;
Button1.TabOrder := 10;
ComboBox1 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
ComboBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
ComboBox1.Left := 56;
ComboBox1.Top := 115;
ComboBox1.Width := 145;
ComboBox1.Height := 21;
ComboBox1.ItemHeight := 13;
ComboBox1.TabOrder := 11;
ComboBox1.Text := ‘ore?’;
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘tin’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘copper’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘iron’);
ComboBox1.Items.Add(‘coal’);
ComboBox1.Text := LoadSetting(‘UserPassSaver’, ‘ore’);
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure Randoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindPick;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure MineIt;
begin
if (findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)) or
(findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)) or
(findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)) then
begin
MM(x,y)
wait(200+random(1000))
if (FindBitmapToleranceIn(MineBM,x,y,6,6,126,23,1)) then
begin
wait(200+random(1000)
if (oretomine = ‘tin’) then
begin
FindObjSpe(‘tin’,rc1,10)
if (FindObjSpe) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
wait(200+random(511))
MMC(x,y,)
FindGas(fx,fy)
repeat
wait(100)
until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)or)
end;
if (oretomine = ‘copper’) then
begin
FindObjSpe(‘cop’,rc1,10)
if (FindObjSpe) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
wait(200+random(511))
MMC(x,y,)
FindGas(fx,fy)
repeat
wait(100)
until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)or)
end;
if (oretomine = ‘iron’) then
begin
FindObjSpe(‘iro’,rc1,10)
if (FindObjSpe) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
wait(200+random(511))
MMC(x,y,)
FindGas(fx,fy)
repeat
wait(100)
until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)or)
end;
if (oretomine = ‘coal’) then
begin
FindObjSpe(‘coa’,rc1,10)
if (FindObjSpe) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
wait(200+random(511))
MMC(x,y,)
FindGas(fx,fy)
repeat
wait(100)
until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)or
findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)or)
end;
end;
end;
end;

procedure LoadBitmaps;
begin
MineBM := BitmapFromString(1, 17, ‘z78DA3330A0’ +
‘070000D9831321’);
end;

procedure MM(x,y:integer);
begin
MMouse(x,y,5,5)
wait(400+random(600))
movemousesmooth(x,y)
end;

procedure MMC(x,y:integer);
begin
MMouse(x,y,5,5)
wait(400+random(600))
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(400+random(600))
holdmouse(x,y,true)
wait(200+random(300))
releasemouse(x,y,true)
end;

begin
setupSRL;
MarkTime;
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
setup;
end.[/scar]

I got that far, but it says Unknown Idnetifier MM So yeh ill try l8er

item.title: Help with my poweriner
item.dc:creator: @derek9456 derek9456
item.description:
@derek9456 wrote:

{=========================================================================]
[                   Anywhere Powerminer                                   ]
[                                                                         ]
[           NAME        : Anywhere Powerminer                             ]
[           WRITER      : Derek9456                                       ]
[           CATEGORY    : Miner                                           ]
[           DESCRIPTION : mines ores and then drops them                  ]
[           USAGE       : Use for leveling up your mining                 ]
[           AUTOCOLOR   : hmmm                                            ]
[           NOTES       : best used in al karid                           ]
[           CONTACT     : troy.cos@gmail.com                              ]
[                                                                         ]
[                                                                         ]
[=========================================================================]
[=========================================================================]
[                           Instructions.                                 ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright.                          ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color.                                ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in DeclarePlayers.                     ]
[=========================================================================}

 {*******************************************************************************
function TimeFromMark(var TimeMarker: integer): integer;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description: returns Milliseconds since MarkTime was set
*******************************************************************************}

program powerminer;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/mining.scar}

const
{//////////SETUP\\\\\\\\\\}
rc1 = 0;
rc2 = 0;
rc3 = 0;
{//////////SETUP\\\\\\\\\\}



var
  frmDesign : TForm;
  Label1 : TLabel;
  Label2 : TLabel;
  Edit1 : TEdit;
  Edit2 : TEdit;
  Button1 : TButton;
  ComboBox1 : TComboBox;
  Username, Password, oretomine : String;
  MineBM,fx,fy : integer;

Procedure setup;
begin
 Username := Edit1.Text;
 Password := Edit2.Text;
 case ComboBox1.Text of
 'tin' : oretomine := 'tin';
 'copper' : oretomine := 'copper';
 'iron' : oretomine := 'iron';
 'coal' : oretomine := 'coal';
 FindPickHeadColor;
 LoadMiningBitMaps;
 LoadBitmaps;
 PickUpItems:=False;
 SaveSetting('UserPassSaver', 'Username', Edit1.Text);
 SaveSetting('UserPassSaver', 'Password', Edit2.Text);
 SaveSetting('UserPassSaver', 'ore', ComboBox1.Text);
end;



procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
 frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + '.';
 frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

procedure initform;
begin
 frmDesign := CreateForm;
 frmDesign.Left := 250;
 frmDesign.Top := 114;
 frmDesign.Width := 272;
 frmDesign.Height := 327;
 frmDesign.Caption := 'Script setup';
 frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
 frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
 frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
 frmDesign.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
 frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
 frmDesign.Visible := False;
 frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
 Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
 Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
 Label1.Left := 36;
 Label1.Top := 45;
 Label1.Width := 48;
 Label1.Height := 13;
 Label1.Caption := 'Username';
 Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
 Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
Label2.Left := 36;
 Label2.Top := 74;
 Label2.Width := 46;
 Label2.Height := 13;
 Label2.Caption := 'Password';
 Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
 Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
 Edit1.Text := LoadSetting('UserPassSaver', 'Username');
 Edit1.Left := 100;
 Edit1.Top := 43;
 Edit1.Width := 121;
 Edit1.Height := 21;
 Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
 Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
 Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
 Edit1.Text := LoadSetting('UserPassSaver', 'Password');
 Edit2.Left := 100;
 Edit2.Top := 73;
 Edit2.Width := 121;
 Edit2.Height := 21;
 Edit2.TabOrder := 9;
 Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
 Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
 Button1.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
 Button1.Left := 98;
 Button1.Top := 220;
 Button1.Width := 75;
 Button1.Height := 25;
 Button1.Caption := 'start!';
 Button1.TabOrder := 10;
 ComboBox1 := TComboBox.Create(frmDesign);
 ComboBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
 ComboBox1.Left := 56;
 ComboBox1.Top := 115;
 ComboBox1.Width := 145;
 ComboBox1.Height := 21;
 ComboBox1.ItemHeight := 13;
 ComboBox1.TabOrder := 11;
 ComboBox1.Text := 'ore?';
 ComboBox1.Items.Add('tin');
 ComboBox1.Items.Add('copper');
 ComboBox1.Items.Add('iron');
 ComboBox1.Items.Add('coal');
 ComboBox1.Text := LoadSetting('UserPassSaver', 'ore');
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var  v: TVariantArray;
begin
 setarraylength(V, 0);
 ThreadSafeCall('InitForm', v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
 frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure Randoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindPick;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var  v: TVariantArray;
begin
 setarraylength(V, 0);
 ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModal', v);
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
 WriteLn('You have clicked the button');
 frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + '.';
 frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

procedure MineIt;
begin
 if (findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)) or
    (findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)) or
    (findcolorspiraltolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)) then
 begin
  MM(x,y)
  wait(200+random(1000))
  if (FindBitmapToleranceIn(MineBM,x,y,6,6,126,23,1)) then
   begin
   wait(200+random(1000)
   if (oretomine = 'tin') then
    begin
    FindObjSpe('tin',rc1,10)
    if (FindObjSpe) then
      begin
      getmousepos(x,y)
      wait(200+random(511))
      MMC(x,y,)
      FindGas(fx,fy)
      repeat
      wait(100)
      until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)or)
      end;
   if (oretomine = 'copper') then
    begin
    FindObjSpe('cop',rc1,10)
    if (FindObjSpe) then
      begin
      getmousepos(x,y)
      wait(200+random(511))
      MMC(x,y,)
      FindGas(fx,fy)
      repeat
      wait(100)
      until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)or)
      end;
   if (oretomine = 'iron') then
    begin
    FindObjSpe('iro',rc1,10)
    if (FindObjSpe) then
      begin
      getmousepos(x,y)
      wait(200+random(511))
      MMC(x,y,)
      FindGas(fx,fy)
      repeat
      wait(100)
      until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)or)
      end;
   if (oretomine = 'coal') then
    begin
    FindObjSpe('coa',rc1,10)
    if (FindObjSpe) then
      begin
      getmousepos(x,y)
      wait(200+random(511))
      MMC(x,y,)
      FindGas(fx,fy)
      repeat
      wait(100)
      until(not findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor1,3,3,513,338,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor2,3,3,513,338,20)or
                findcolortolerance(fx,fy,orecolor3,3,3,513,338,20)or)
      end;
   end;
 end;
end;

procedure LoadBitmaps;
begin
 MineBM := BitmapFromString(1, 17, 'z78DA3330A0' +
       '070000D9831321');
end;

procedure MM(x,y:integer);
begin
 MMouse(x,y,5,5)
 wait(400+random(600))
 movemousesmooth(x,y)
end;

procedure MMC(x,y:integer);
begin
 MMouse(x,y,5,5)
 wait(400+random(600))
 movemousesmooth(x,y)
 wait(400+random(600))
 holdmouse(x,y,true)
 wait(200+random(300))
 releasemouse(x,y,true)
end;

begin
setupSRL;
MarkTime;
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
setup;
end.

thats my code…
whn i run it i get

Line 67: [Error] (15299:18): colon (':') expected in script E:\Programs\Scar 2.03\Scripts\my powerminer.scar
